Package fi.tuni.swdesign.group3.gui.view

Class DataQuery

java.lang.Object
fi.tuni.swdesign.group3.gui.view.DataQuery
Direct Known Subclasses:
CombinedDataQuery, RoadDataQuery, WeatherDataQuery
public abstract class DataQuery extends Object
An abstract base class for storing the parameters given by the user into an object.
Author:
Lauri Puoskari
